programme.title: NBA Basketball
programme.desc: The Spurs and Mavericks kick off their 2025-26 campaigns with an all-Texas showdown. San Antonio star Victor Wembanyama returns to action after missing the final 30 games of the previous season due to deep vein thrombosis discovered in his shoulder.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Live: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith hosts this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: Live: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee brings his humor and candor to the microphone to highlight the day's top stories.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: NBA Today
programme.desc: In-depth, comprehensive daily coverage of all aspects of the NBA from expert analysts.

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: NBA Tip-Off
programme.desc: Host Ernie Johnson and analysts Charles Barkley and Kenny Smith ready viewers for NBA action before TNT's Thursday night doubleheaders (and other select telecasts). Guest analysts also are featured from time to time, including Chris Webber and Kevin McHale.

programme.title: Live: NBA Basketball
programme.desc: A rematch of the 2025 NBA Finals sees the Pacers host the Thunder. Oklahoma City outlasted Indiana in a seven-game thriller for the Thunder's first championship. Indiana is without Tyrese Haliburton for the entire season due to a torn Achilles.

programme.title: Live: NBA Basketball
programme.desc: The Warriors host the Nuggets at the Chase Center. David Adelman, the son of former NBA bench boss Rick, begins his first full season as Denver head coach. The Nuggets traded Michael Porter Jr. to the Nets for Cameron Johnson in the offseason.

programme.title: Live: Inside the NBA
programme.desc: This Emmy Award-winning studio show, which airs following NBA telecasts on ESPN, is hosted by Ernie Johnson, with analysis from Hall of Famer Charles Barkley and NBA champions Kenny Smith and Shaquille O'Neal. It's a mix of highlights, interviews and hijinks, notably the verbal sparring sessions between the outspoken Barkley and his straight man, Smith. The show also welcomes various guest analysts throughout the season.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Golden Bears (5-2, 2-1 ACC) make their first trip to Lane Stadium to face the Hokies (2-5, 1-2). The only previous meeting between the schools came in the 2003 Insight Bowl, when Cal quarterback Aaron Rodgers led his side to a 52-49 shootout win.

programme.title: Live: College GameDay
programme.desc: Originating from the site of one of the day's best matchups, with a sea of fans cheering wildly in the background, host Rece Davis and analysts Lee Corso, Kirk Herbstreit and Desmond Howard talk college football for three hours, reporting on the top teams, games, players and storylines. David Pollack and Maria Taylor contribute reports, interviews and features. Davis replaced longtime host Chris Fowler in 2015.

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: Playing For Keeps is a romantic comedy about a former soccer star who returns home to put his life back together. Looking for a way to rebuild his relationship with his son, he gets roped into coaching the boy's soccer team.

programme.title: Mr. Morgan's Last Love
programme.desc: From the day Pauline (Clemence Poésy) lends him a helping hand on the bus, the stubborn and weary Matthew Morgan (Sir Michael Caine) stumbles back to happiness.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.

programme.title: A Rainy Day in New York
programme.desc: Woody Allen's romantic comedy A RAINY DAY IN NEW YORK tells the story of college sweethearts, Gatsby (Timothée Chalamet) and Ashleigh (Elle Fanning), whose plans for a romantic weekend together in New York City are dashed as quickly as the sunlight turns into showers.

programme.title: Forever In My Heart
programme.desc: Jenna and Charlie found love in Ireland but their dreams drove them apart. Five years later, they reunite and Jenna has to decide where her heart belongs—back home or in the Emerald Isle.

programme.title: The Beauty Of Love
programme.desc: Emma has a lifestyle website that she puts her heart and soul into called “Classically Emma”. But when her numbers start trending down, she thinks she might've found her fix in a partnership with an ambitious millennial named Jill who has her own dreams.

programme.title: Basmati Blues
programme.desc: Linda Watt (Brie Larson: Room, 21 Jump Street) is a sheltered but brilliant young scientist who is plucked out of her company's lab and sent to India by her CEO (Donald Sutherland: The Hunger Games) to sell "Rice 9," a genetically modified rice she's created.

programme.title: Can You Keep A Secret?
programme.desc: On a return flight from a botched client meeting, Emma reveals all of her deepest secrets to a handsome stranger when her plane hits turbulence and she believes she is going to die. Emma thinks she will never see the guy again.

programme.title: Alone Together
programme.desc: Two strangers wind up double-booked in the same New York rental at the start of quarantine. Exasperating the situation, these polar opposites must learn to cope with each other's eccentricities, realizing they have more in common than meets the eye.

programme.title: Still Today
programme.desc: After being left at the altar, Pete's groomsman give him a wedding gift he'll never forget. An escort. Maybe it's the Lunar Eclipse, maybe it's fate, but after a magical night in the city maybe this girl is what Pete needed all along.

programme.title: Smart People
programme.desc: A widowed professor (Dennis Quaid) experiences a new love and an unexpected visit from his adopted brother.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace (Selena Gomez) is an ordinary girl who becomes an accidental princess when a family summer trip to Paris turns into the fantasy of a lifetime. Living like royalty, Grace, along with her two best friends, discovers who she really is – by assuming another person's identity.

programme.title: Moonstruck
programme.desc: In this classic romantic comedy, a Brooklyn widow (Cher) is ready to get married again. Only this time, she plans on doing it right, even if she has to say “yes” to a man she doesn't really love.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Calvin (Ice Cube) is a would-be entrepreneur with big plans...and running his family's barbershop isn't one of them. But when he impulsively sells the shop to a shady loan shark, he soon realizes just how important the neighborhood parlor is to him... and just how far he'll go to get it back!

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: An American journalism student in London scoops a big story, and begins an affair with an aristocrat as the incident unfurls.

programme.title: Class Rank
programme.desc: CLASS RANK is a funny and touching coming-of-age drama in the vein of Election, Easy A or Legally Blonde, from the director of Glee...

programme.title: A Rainy Day in New York
programme.desc: Woody Allen's romantic comedy A RAINY DAY IN NEW YORK tells the story of college sweethearts, Gatsby (Timothée Chalamet) and Ashleigh (Elle Fanning), whose plans for a romantic weekend together in New York City are dashed as quickly as the sunlight turns into showers.

programme.title: Girl Most Likely
programme.desc: Kristen Wiig stars as Imogene, once a promising young New York playwright whose promise has fizzled, thanks to a crisis of confidence. Heavily in denial about being dumped by her society boyfriend, Imogene uses her skill for drama to stage an elaborate fake suicide as an appeal for his sympathy.

programme.title: The Player
programme.desc: In this hilarious black comedy, infamous Hollywood studio executive Griffin Mill receives death threats from an anonymous writer whose script he rejected - but can he figure out which one before they make good on their promise?

programme.title: Ceremony
programme.desc: Entertaining romantic comedy about a young man who crashes the wedding of an older woman (Uma Thurman) he still loves.

programme.title: Fanboys
programme.desc: A group of Star Wars fans travel to Skywalker Ranch to steal a copy of "The Phantom Menace" so that their terminally ill friend can see it before it's released in cinemas several months later.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf The Other Cheek: Hefty Smurf meets an old Trolless in the forest, and the old crone begs him to relieve her of a red spot on her nose by... giving her a good kick here and now! Hefty half-heartedly obliges... And the result is a big surprise for him!

programme.title: The Trojan Smurf
programme.desc: Gargamel, the evil wizard, has devised a new plan to capture the Smurfs: he builds a giant statue in the shape of Papa Smurf. Thus, he hopes, the Smurfs are going to drag the statue into their Village.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Patchwork Bear: There isn't a River Smurf anymore: someone has frozen it near its source. The Smurfs go to the Emerald Empress' country to see what the trouble is, and they meet the Patchwork Bear as well as the Iron Pyrites...

programme.title: Smurfette's Sweet Tooth
programme.desc: Once a year, Greedy Smurf makes a special batch of Smurfberry candy. Every Smurf receives a whole year's provision of the smurfiest candy in the whole world. But can a Smurf keep his provision for a whole year? Can the Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Breakfast At Greedy's: This time, Gargamel feels sure of himself. Well, almost. He is going to try and finally catch the little Smurfs! Greedy Smurf's lighter-than-air pancakes are almost responsible for the Smurfs floating into Gargamel's grasp...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Petrified Smurfs: Brainy Smurf's done it again. This time, in front of Papa Smurf, too. He has recited a spell that changes everything to stone. Everything including himself and all the Smurfs and the Village, and the forest around for miles... Fortunately, Peewit appears....

programme.title: The Bignose Dilemma
programme.desc: Vanity dislikes having the same blue nose as any other Smurf. What he needs is something special... Bignose, Bigmouth's fiancée, also wants to change her nose. And so, by the way, does Gargamel. Some nose exchanging takes place...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfily Ever After: The boy from the wood and Laconia, the deaf-mute elf, ask Papa Smurf to celebrate their wedding. The Smurfs are getting the party ready, following the advice of the Smurfette, when Gargamel comes to put a spoke in their wheel.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurflings, Part I (Smurf Quest 1): Guess who's coming back to the Village of the Smurfs? Grandpa Smurf himself, who's been away for some five hundred years. He returns with grave news: the Smurfs will have to find the four magical elements to make the long life Stone, or their very existence is going to be in jeopardy. Can they do it in just one day?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurflings, Part II (Smurf Quest 2): Thinking a treasure is to be found, Gargamel follows the Smurfs every step: into Jack Frost's cave, then to the desert in search of the Pyramid of Zenobia, and in the West Wind's lair... The Smurfs must find the four elements of the long life Stone before sundown. But can it be done? Can the Smurfs preserve their very existence?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurflings, Part III (Smurf Quest 3): While the Smurfs left at the Village try to find Grandpa Smurf's box and survive a flood caused by a geyser, Grandpa himself, Papa Smurf, Sassette and a few Smurfs more try to secure the last missing element from a volcano guarded by the terrifying wooden Tikis... and Gargamel, with Azrael as usual, do their best to foul things up for the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Enchanted Quill: As if Gargamel didn't have enough troubles as it is. Now he is saddled with a new problem, a problem by the name of Scruple, a new apprentice. A lazy, insolent, good-for-nothing character who will help in getting hold of the enchanted quill, a magic pen that writes nothing but the truth... and is going, or so Gargamel hopes, to aid in catching the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Fire-Fighting Smurfs: Snappy doesn't always do as he is told. For instance, he is a little careless in putting out the campfire where the Smurfs have been roasting marshmallows. Even though the Smurfs are doing the impossible in trying to save the forest from the holocaust, the situation looks bleak. Snappy is hunted by remorse. And he would be even more so if he knew what the evil Gargamel is up to.

programme.title: Can't Smurf The Music
programme.desc: There is nothing the sorceress Chlorhydris hates so much as love in the world. She would like to see all love banished from the face of the Earth, and she's going to start with music. She puts a spell on a magic horn so that it will suck the music out of every song... especially the Smurfs' songs. Helped by their friend Laconia, the Smurfs may be able to resist Chlorhydris' evil plan...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - It's A Puppy's Life: The evil wizard Gargamel has got hold of magical ectoplasmic crystal eggs that will enable him to change bodies with Papa Smurf. What better plan could there be? Disguised as Papa Smurf, he's going to lead all the Smurfs to his cauldron! But as fate would have it, Gargamel is changed into Puppy, the Smurf doggie...

programme.title: Farmer's Genie
programme.desc: As Farmer Smurf says, what's a gourd doing in the melon patch, when it should be by the rutabagas? But when Farmer Smurf pulls the gourd out of the ground he frees a genie, which calls him Master and insists on granting him wishes. The genie, called Gourdy, is going to be more of a hindrance than a help in his eagerness to please Farmer Smurf.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette's Flowers: It's not every day you meet a talking flower. Especially not a character like Petaluma, a somewhat haughty bulb flower who Smurfette meets in the forest. Of course the delighted Smurfette takes Petaluma to the Village of the Smurfs... and starts a process that is going to endanger all of the Smurfs. Flowers, it seems, ought to be seen and not heard.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Crying Smurfs: Everybody can make a mistake. Take Papa Smurf, for instance. His new perfume-enhancing spray makes a rose smell like a thousand roses...but due to a whole series of misadventures it also makes all the Smurfs cry, moved to tears by the slightest of pretexts. While they sob, bawl, wail moan and whimper, the evil wizard Gargamel does not stand still...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Gargamel's Dummy: Tonight is talent show night in the Village of the Smurfs. Grandpa Smurf is going to do magic tricks, Sassette is going to perform with her trained pet frog, Clumsy is going to try his hand at juggling... and Jokey Smurf has made a dummy of Gargamel that he is sure will frighten the Smurfs out of their wits. But the real Gargamel finds a way to animate Jokey's dummy and then...

programme.title: Smurf On The Run
programme.desc: Little things can sometimes bring about big effects. In trying to catch Sassette, Gargamel upsets the Balance of Truth, and from then on everybody in the world tells lies. Even Papa Smurf is changed into a pathological liar. What is more, the Spirit of the Scales chain Gargamel and Sassette to each other, and together they have to replace the Topaz of Truth....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby's New Toy: Baby Smurf has lost all interest in toys. Even Jokey's surprises fail to amuse the tiny tyke. Grandpa Smurf suggests they go and pay a visit to the Toymaker, the one who makes toys for children all over the world. Or rather used to make: the Toymaker is tired of the lack of appreciation his toys receive from those who receive them.

programme.title: Handy's Window-Vision
programme.desc: Miner Smurf leaves no stone unturned and this is how he discovers a crystal that transmits images. Thus Handy is able to invent window-vision and, every morning from then on, the Smurfs are able to watch Hefty's workouts, Farmer Smurf's crop reports or even the Brainy Smurf Hour. But would you believe it? The evil wizard Gargamel takes advantage of this image-watching to catch Smurfs!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Last Spell: Papa Smurf has been elected Wizard of the Year, and the evil wizard Gargamel is beside himself with jealousy. He will see to it that Papa's powers all disappear. And then, he is sure to catch all the Smurfs and celebrate with a big feast... But now, would Papa Smurf let such a bad thing happen? Surely not, Papa finds a way to foil Gargamel's plan...

programme.title: The Colour Smurf
programme.desc: Spectra is the Colour Fairy, the one whose wheel of colours make all the blues, reds, yellows and greens of the world. She is a friend of Painter Smurf, so when he takes the Smurflings to her home in her absence, the Smurflings fool around with the Colour Wheel... and all the colours disappear from the Earth. What's worse, without colours the Colour Fairy cannot live...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sweepy Smurf: Sweepy the chimney sweep Smurf is not the most popular inhabitant of the Village of the Smurfs. He is rather messy, and the clouds of soot that he makes certainly don't add to his popularity. Only the Smurflings find him great company as he's the only one who can get dirty and not be told off. Yet in their enthusiasm for Sweepy, the Smurflings endanger the Village.

programme.title: Don Smurfo
programme.desc: Everyone has their own dreams. That of Smurfette is to meet the legendary Don Smurfo, the dashing, witty, swashbuckling hero of many an engrossing tale. The Smurfs shrug at this infatuation. But when a real-life Don Smurfo appears in the village and Smurfette snubs them all in favor of the bragging stranger, they take the matter a little more seriously.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Cloak: What is in the box that's been found by Jokey Smurf? A cloak belonging to Wizlow the Magician gnome. And what sort of cloak? Jokey learns that it's a cloak of invisibility. Whoever wears it has a great opportunity of playing practical jokes... And guess what havoc an invisible Jokey is able to wreak on the Village. Yet if Wizlow parted with the cloak, there must be a reason...

programme.title: Snappy's Way
programme.desc: Did you know that if you catch a troll, he may grant you one wish? It just happens that Aloysius the Troll gets caught in one of Gargamel's Smurf traps. Snappy Smurf sets him free and as a reward, gets to make all other Smurfs obey his every whim. Now this brings a lot of trouble to the Smurfs, as Smurflings, sometimes, ask for things that are not good for them... or anybody else.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Bookworm Smurf: Brainy Smurf is aghast. Sassette cannot read, and thus might be forever prevented from learning the pearls of wisdom collected in his book "Brainy Smurf's quotations"! He tries teaching her how to read. What she can read almost from the start is a formula to make all the books disappear! All the books in the world, including Gargamel's spells and Homnibus' books of remedies!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Three Smurfketeers: In another Smurf theatrical super-production based – very loosely – on Alexandre Dumas' characters, a masterpiece of the stage is created, with a few lines from Romeo and Juliet thrown in.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Christmas: The Smurfs come to the rescue of two children and their grandfather when a mysterious stranger appears and causes their sleigh to crash. Knocking on Gargamel's door for help puts them and the Smurfs in danger…

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Clockwork Smurf: Handy has built a very complex Smurf machine that does everything. It proves dangerous when it nearly destroys the village, but comes in useful when, with the help of the other Smurfs, it saves the young prince Gerard's kingdom from the queen aunt Imperia's dastardly intentions.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Fountain Of Smurf: The Smurfs discover a fountain of youth that is guarded by a wicked troll, who steals Papa Smurf's magic book. They convince Gargamel to help them and the greedy villain runs to get the water, but manages to fall in with the troll. As the two chase each other all over the countryside, the Smurfs are able to retrieve Papa Smurf's book.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Giant: Simon is lost in the forest and in search of his parents. Simon is the son of a couple of giants. The Smurfs try to bring him home, but then Gargamel interrupts the party.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Once In A Blue Moon: Once in a blue moon, as the legend goes, a baby Smurf is delivered to the Smurfs and everyone in the village becomes attached to the new arrival. But a mistake has been made and the stork returns to take the baby back. Grouchy and Smurfette have become so attached to the baby that the baby is returned.

programme.title: Gargamel's Mis-Fortune
programme.desc: Gargamel, the evil but incompetent wizard, tries to trick Esmeralda, the gypsy, into giving him a formula to catch the Smurfs. Of course the gypsy proves to be much smarter than Gargamel, and the Smurfs even more so.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tick Tock Smurfs: The village of the Smurfs used to live without a clock. But now suddenly time becomes a precious commodity and Brainy Smurf designs a schedule to take advantage of the new Village clock... Can the Smurfs survive the attacks of time?

programme.title: Hefty And The Wheelsmurfer
programme.desc: Hefty Smurf learns what is to be handicapped when he breaks his leg. Handy Smurf creates the wheelsmurfer for him, a contraption that will give Hefty some mobility. But suddenly the evil wizard Gargamel appears on the scene.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette's Golden Tresses: Hogatha, the repulsive witch, captures the Smurfette. She wants to steal from the little blue beauty her golden hair. Can the Smurfs save their little female companion before it is too late? Can Hogatha grow hair like Smurfette's?

programme.title: Monster Smurfs
programme.desc: This is spook-a-Smurf eve, and all the Smurfs get ready for the fancy dress party… But Brainy Smurf gets hold of Papa Smurf's Book of Magic, and all the Smurfs are changed into hideous but funny creatures. Yet danger lurks...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf The Other Cheek: Hefty Smurf meets an old Trolless in the forest, and the old crone begs him to relieve her of a red spot on her nose by... giving her a good kick here and now! Hefty half-heartedly obliges... And the result is a big surprise for him!

programme.title: The Trojan Smurf
programme.desc: Gargamel, the evil wizard, has devised a new plan to capture the Smurfs: he builds a giant statue in the shape of Papa Smurf. Thus, he hopes, the Smurfs are going to drag the statue into their Village.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Patchwork Bear: There isn't a River Smurf anymore: someone has frozen it near its source. The Smurfs go to the Emerald Empress' country to see what the trouble is, and they meet the Patchwork Bear as well as the Iron Pyrites...

programme.title: Smurfette's Sweet Tooth
programme.desc: Once a year, Greedy Smurf makes a special batch of Smurfberry candy. Every Smurf receives a whole year's provision of the smurfiest candy in the whole world. But can a Smurf keep his provision for a whole year? Can the Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Breakfast At Greedy's: This time, Gargamel feels sure of himself. Well, almost. He is going to try and finally catch the little Smurfs! Greedy Smurf's lighter-than-air pancakes are almost responsible for the Smurfs floating into Gargamel's grasp...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Petrified Smurfs: Brainy Smurf's done it again. This time, in front of Papa Smurf, too. He has recited a spell that changes everything to stone. Everything including himself and all the Smurfs and the Village, and the forest around for miles... Fortunately, Peewit appears....

programme.title: The Bignose Dilemma
programme.desc: Vanity dislikes having the same blue nose as any other Smurf. What he needs is something special... Bignose, Bigmouth's fiancée, also wants to change her nose. And so, by the way, does Gargamel. Some nose exchanging takes place...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfily Ever After: The boy from the wood and Laconia, the deaf-mute elf, ask Papa Smurf to celebrate their wedding. The Smurfs are getting the party ready, following the advice of the Smurfette, when Gargamel comes to put a spoke in their wheel.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurflings, Part I (Smurf Quest 1): Guess who's coming back to the Village of the Smurfs? Grandpa Smurf himself, who's been away for some five hundred years. He returns with grave news: the Smurfs will have to find the four magical elements to make the long life Stone, or their very existence is going to be in jeopardy. Can they do it in just one day?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurflings, Part II (Smurf Quest 2): Thinking a treasure is to be found, Gargamel follows the Smurfs every step: into Jack Frost's cave, then to the desert in search of the Pyramid of Zenobia, and in the West Wind's lair... The Smurfs must find the four elements of the long life Stone before sundown. But can it be done? Can the Smurfs preserve their very existence?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurflings, Part III (Smurf Quest 3): While the Smurfs left at the Village try to find Grandpa Smurf's box and survive a flood caused by a geyser, Grandpa himself, Papa Smurf, Sassette and a few Smurfs more try to secure the last missing element from a volcano guarded by the terrifying wooden Tikis... and Gargamel, with Azrael as usual, do their best to foul things up for the Smurfs.

programme.title: Arizona Colt Returns
programme.desc: Famed gunman Arizona Colt is sent by Moreno to rescue his daughter from the grips of Arizona's old enemy, Keane. But certain complications make the mission far more dangerous than expected.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 22, 23, 24
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Seven Alone
programme.desc: A frontier family crosses the U.S. by wagon train, hoping for a better life in the Oregon Territory.

programme.title: Bury Them Deep
programme.desc: An army payroll is robbed by Billy Gun. The Army hires Clive Norton to recover the money. To help him, Norton rescues from the gallows a man who especially despises Gun.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: An ex-army officer accidentally kills a woman's son and tries to make up for it by escorting the funeral procession through dangerous Indian territory.

programme.title: Jalisco, Don't Backslide
programme.desc: A man hated by his father and in love with a beautiful woman whose brothers do not approve of the relationship and persecute him.

programme.title: Bounty Hunter in Trinity
programme.desc: The townsfolk of Trinity decide to hire a notorious bounty hunter to protect them from a fierce band of Mexican outlaws who are terrorizing the area.

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: In 1854, Jeb Stuart, George Custer and other graduates from West Point are posted to Kansas to help pacify the territory before railroad construction to Santa Fe can resume.

programme.title: The Bounty Killer
programme.desc: A tenderfoot becomes a bounty hunter in the hopes of making a better future for himself and his new love.

programme.title: El Rojo
programme.desc: The Sorenson family is massacred, apparently by Indians. On the site of the killing, a town, Gold Hill grows up, run by a group of businessmen.

programme.title: Robbery Under Arms
programme.desc: Two brothers join their father in Captain Starlight's bush ranger gang in 19th Century Australia.

programme.title: God Gave Rock & Roll To Us! Top 30
programme.desc: Guitars, big beats and a fantastic rhythm section - this is how we rocked out in the 90s! With Guns & Roses, Bon Jovi, Red Hot Chili Peppers & Brit Pop legends Pulp, Blur & Oasis.

programme.title: Legendary Rock: 1980-1989
programme.desc: These are the legendary rock stars that made the 80s! Expect Meat Loaf, Bonnie Tyler, Queen, Bon Jovi, AC/DC, Iron Maiden & loads more!

programme.title: 80s v 90s Rock Legends!
programme.desc: 30 hit songs, 15 top rock legends - one track as they were in the 80s, and another in the 90s - simple!

programme.title: Nicky Horne's 25 Greatest Riffs!
programme.desc: Nicky brings you rock gods & goddesses who unleash pure power delivering 25 of the most amazing riffs that are firmly etched into rock DNA forever!

programme.title: Maxed Out On Anthems!
programme.desc: Live it loud and Max out on the finest rock anthems! Featuring Paramore, Imagine Dragons, Linkin Park, Evanescense & The Arctic Monkeys. This is Now Rock!

programme.title: No Intro Needed: The Top 50
programme.desc: 50 tracks we know you know - but how fast can you name them? One thing's for sure: after the first note, you'll be singing them all night long!

programme.title: Rated Rock! The No.1s
programme.desc: Number 1 rock songs from the last 50 years! With mega hits from the Arctic Monkeys & KOL right back to legends like The Stones & T.Rex!

programme.title: Atomic! 50 Rock Party Anthems
programme.desc: 50 reasons to get you party on with epic rock anthems from Sum 41, Europe, Queen, Starship, Blondie, and many more!

programme.title: Party Rock Anthems!
programme.desc: Party pop rock anthems spanning 5 decades! From Queen, Kiss & Aerosmith to Blur, Paramore & The White Stripes.

programme.title: The All Night Rock Party!
programme.desc: Sing-a-long classics & rock party anthems all night long. Crazy, Crazy, Crazy party nights featuring KISS, Queen, Meatloaf, Kaiser Chiefs and Foo Fighters to name just a few!

programme.title: M6 Boutique
programme.desc: Retrouvez les dernières innovations et des offres exclusives en matière de bijoux, beauté, cuisine, maison.

programme.title: Ça peut vous arriver
programme.desc: Julien Courbet va tout tenter pour résoudre vos problèmes mais aussi apporter des infos juridiques et conseils spécifiques. La parole est donnée à toutes les parties pour que toutes les situations litigieuses trouvent un dénouement positif !

programme.title: Le meilleur pâtissier
programme.desc: Pour la semaine de l'horreur, Cyril attend des huit pâtissiers toujours en lice qu'ils revisitent le roulé et rendent ce grand classique aussi effrayant que gourmand. C'est ensuite au tour de l'épreuve technique avec le gâteau-cerveau, la plus bluffante des créations tirées du grimoire de Mercotte.

programme.title: Le meilleur pâtissier

programme.title: Le meilleur pâtissier : qui réintégrera la tente ?
programme.desc: Le pâtissier sortant du jour affronte le gagnant du face-à-face de la semaine précédente. Pour cette spéciale horreur, les jurés soumettent les pâtissiers à une redoutable épreuve technique qui avait déjà fait frissonner la sixième promotion du concours : les doigts de sorcière, un délicieux dessert pour une épreuve pleine de rebondissement. Au programme également, les meilleurs moments des 13 saisons du concours, les coulisses et les inédits de la semaine.

programme.title: Le meilleur pâtissier
programme.desc: S14 E7 Frissons gourmands ! Pour l'ultime épreuve de la semaine de l'horreur, les huit candidats doivent révéler leur plus grande phobie sous la forme d'un gâteau suspendu... comme une lanterne. Pour ce gravity cake de la peur, ils peuvent compter sur les conseils du célèbre chef pâtissier Pierre Marcolini, qui les accompagne dans cette sombre épreuve.

programme.title: Le meilleur pâtissier

programme.desc: Ce conseiller financier aurait détourné les économies de ses clients ! Promettant des placements sûrs, un conseiller en profitait pour détourner l'argent de ses clients. - Arnaquées et brulées par leurs esthéticiennes ! - Des garagistes au bord de la faillite à cause d'un client ! - La véranda de la discorde.

programme.title: Arnaques !
programme.desc: Dans ce numéro d'\"Arnaques !\", Julien Courbet évoque notamment le cas d'un client, très mal intentionné, qui a amené sa voiture au garage, puis qui l'a récupéré sans payer. Cette situation met le garage dans une position périlleuse et le préjudice s'élève à près de 8000 euros. Comment régler ce cas ?

programme.title: Arnaques !
programme.desc: Youri et Maeva ont acheté une maison 400 000 euros pour la faire rénover mais se sont fait arnaquer. Dans l'ouest de la France, une dizaine de personnes a également été victime d'un artisan qui leur avait promis des maisons écologiques et pas chères, construites dans des containers maritimes.

programme.title: Cauchemar en cuisine
programme.desc: Cette semaine, Philippe Etchebest se rend dans les Bouches-du-Rhône, à Sénas, où Mélanie et Mylène, des jumelles de 28 ans, ont fait appel à lui pour sauver le restaurant qu'elles gèrent avec leur grande soeur Séverine. Bien qu'il soit placé au centre du village, les clients ont déserté leur établissement.

programme.title: Cauchemar en cuisine
programme.desc: S10 E1 Sénas Cette semaine, Philippe Etchebest se rend dans les Bouches-du-Rhône, à Sénas, où Mélanie et Mylène, des jumelles de 28 ans, ont fait appel à lui pour sauver le restaurant qu'elles gèrent avec leur grande soeur Séverine. Bien qu'il soit placé au centre du village, les clients ont déserté leur établissement.

programme.title: Cauchemar en cuisine
programme.desc: Le chef Etchebest prend la direction de Langeron, un petit village de la Nièvre, où le seul restaurant est en danger. Ce sont d'ailleurs des habitants de la ville qui ont fait appel au cuisinier réputé pour tenter de sauver l'établissement d'Aline et Luc, un couple de restaurateurs complètement dépassé.

programme.title: Cauchemar en cuisine
programme.desc: S10 E1 Sénas Mélanie, Mylène et Séverine, trois soeurs, déplorent que les clients désertent leur établissement. Soupe à la grimace, accusations, mépris : Philippe Etchebest s'est retrouvé en plein coeur d'un conflit familial.

programme.title: Cauchemar en cuisine
programme.desc: Philippe Etchebest, au fur et à mesure de son temps passé dans le restaurant de Langeron, découvre à la fois amusé et étonné que Luc a été chef pendant plusieurs années dans un club échangiste. Ce sont donc des patrons pleins de surprises auxquels le chef est confronté. Mais va-t-il réussir à découvrir ce qui cloche vraiment dans leur établissement et parviendra-t-il à les sauver ?

programme.title: Zone interdite
programme.desc: Des Français sont suivis alors qu'ils attaquent un chantier afin de faire baisser leur facture de gaz ou d'électricité. Quelles sont les bonnes techniques de rénovation pour y parvenir ? Certains ménages comptent sur les aides de l'Etat, des subventions qui aiguisent l'appétit de professionnels peu scrupuleux.

programme.title: Enquête exclusive
programme.desc: Nées à la fin du XIXe siècle, les foires américaines sont devenues au fil des décennies un des symboles du divertissement made in USA, entre démesure et traditions rurales. Ces événements populaires XXL attirent plus de 150 millions de visiteurs par an et génèrent 30 milliards d'euros de chiffre d'affaires.

programme.title: Enquête Exclusive
programme.desc: Toujours plus spectaculaires, les shows de « Monsters cars », sont devenus les attractions parmi les plus courues en France.

programme.title: Enquête exclusive
programme.desc: Les shows de Monsters Cars sont devenus les attractions parmi les plus courues de l'été. Des cascadeurs aux commandes de 4x4 écrasent tout type de voitures tandis que d'autres sont au volant de poids lourds qui crachent des flammes avec leurs rutilants pots d'échappement. Quelques familles se transmettent leur savoir.

programme.title: Enquête Exclusive
programme.desc: La plus grande tragédie qu’ait connu Israël aurait-elle pu être évitée ? C’est la question que posent aujourd’hui certaines familles de victimes de l’attaque terroriste du 7 octobre 2023. Ce jour-là, les raids sanglants du Hamas ont fait près 1 200 morts et 251 Israéliens sont pris en otage.

programme.desc: Loin d'être un long fleuve tranquille, la vie de couple est émaillée de conflits, de disputes et de réconciliations, comme en témoigne le quotidien de quatre d'entre eux. Parmi eux, les trentenaires Cédric et Marion, qui se surnomment mutuellement "poussin", les jeunes parents Emma et Fabien, récemment installés à la campagne avec leur petite Chloé, José et Liliane, mariés depuis plus de vingt ans, sans oublier les inénarrables Huguette et Raymond, des retraités à la méchanceté gratuite. Librement adapté de la série espagnole "Escenas de matrimonio", ce programme court évoque avec humour les hauts et les bas de la vie de couple Loin d'être un long fleuve tranquille, la vie de couple est émaillée de conflits, de disputes et de réconciliations, comme en témoigne le quotidien de quatre d'entre eux. Alvin wants only to get out of prison and start fresh with his girlfriend, Lisa, and when the Feds, led by U.S. Treasury investigator Clenteen, set him loose on a sketchy deal, he thinks his luck has changed. programme.desc: Steven Seagal stars as maverick Detroit police detective Orin Boyd, whose take-no-prisoners approach to domestic terrorism gets him booted downtown to the city's toughest precinct. Multi-Platinum hip hop star DMX stars as the powerful and mysterious crime lord Latrell Walker, whose dicey connections and seemingly unlimited cash make him everyone's target. Together the two men take on a conspiracy that reaches all the way through the ranks to the heart of the precinct.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: For the past year, DEA agent Bobby Trench (Denzel Washington) and U.S. Navy intelligence officer Marcus Stigman (Mark Wahlberg) have been working under cover as members of a narcotics syndicate. The twist: Neither man knows that the other is an undercover agent. When their attempt to infiltrate a Mexican drug cartel and recover millions goes haywire, the men are disavowed by their superiors. Trench and Stigman must go on the run lest they wind up in jail or in a grave.

programme.title: The Last Boy Scout

When she's murdered, he grudgingly teams up with her boyfriend, Jimmy Dix (Damon Wayans), an ex-quarterback with a gambling problem, and the two go after her killers. programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Far from Chicago, hairdresser Gina Norris has relocated to Atlanta with her daughter and has quickly established herself as a rare talent in her profession. But after repeatedly butting heads with her shady, over-the-top boss, Jorge, Norris sets out to create her own salon -- even snagging a few of Jorge's employees and clients, including Lynn and Terri, respectively. Now, Jorge will do anything to shut her down.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Daddy's Little Girls
programme.desc: Monty (Idris Elba), a mechanic, struggles to make ends meet and raise his three young daughters alone. When his drug-dealing ex-wife wins custody of the girls in court, he enlists the help of Julia (Gabrielle Union), a successful attorney, to get the girls back. Romance unexpectedly blooms between the pair, but the couple must come to terms with their very different lives and find a way to keep Monty's family together.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea Goes to Jail
programme.desc: After a high-speed car chase, Madea (Tyler Perry) winds up behind bars because her quick temper gets the best of her. Meanwhile, Assistant District Attorney Josh Hardaway (Derek Luke) lands a case that's too personal to handle: that of a young prostitute and former drug addict named Candace (Keshia Knight Pulliam). When Candace winds up in jail, Madea takes the young woman under her protective wing.

programme.title: The Perfect Match
programme.desc: Charlie (Terrence J) is a charming playboy who doesn't believe in serious relationships. His best friends bet him that if he commits to one woman for one month, he's bound to fall in love. Charlie accepts the seemingly easy challenge, but wasn't expecting to cross paths with the beautiful and mysterious Eva (Cassie Ventura). When Charlie coaxes her into a casual affair, Eva turns the tables on him, forcing the lifelong bachelor to question whether he wants more than just a one-night stand.

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: Delivery man Leo Jackson (Donald Faison) is definitely on the wrong road to success. He still lives at home, he and his girlfriend just broke up, and he has multiple complaints stacked against him at work. Fortunately, Leo has plenty of marijuana to keep his mind off his troubles. But when he accidentally delivers a box of cocaine to the wrong address, Leo finds himself in the middle of a bad deal that may just cost him his life.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: There's trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptune's crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBob's boss, is the culprit. Though he's just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krab's life.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2
programme.desc: Despite his efforts, Peter can't seem to shake his reputation for mischief among the other rabbits. Once he adventures out of the garden Peter finds himself in a world where mischief is appreciated, but soon his family come to bring him home.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A haphazard spy returns to MI-7 after years in a Tibetan monastery honing his zen skills. Armed with gizmos, gadgets and chaotic luck he takes on a global ring of assassins.

programme.title: IF
programme.desc: After discovering she can see everyone's imaginary friends, a girl embarks on a magical adventure to reconnect forgotten IFs with their kids.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the children's story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything they've faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: Fibs, pranks and manoeuvres take centre stage amid a 14-year-old habitual liar's bizarre confrontation with an obnoxious filmmaker who is in dire need of a blockbuster.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Magical Movies
programme.desc: From Harry Potter to Fantastic Beasts, Ella Enchanted to The Secret Garden. Discover a collection of magical journeys where destiny and wonder collide.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents' deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potter's adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemort's return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teacher's constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: The return of Lord Voldemort wreaks havoc in both the Muggle and Wizarding worlds. Harry suspects new dangers lie within Hogwarts.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledore's death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harry's home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestrange's clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledore's tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemort's soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix' vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents' deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potter's adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemort's return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teacher's constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: The return of Lord Voldemort wreaks havoc in both the Muggle and Wizarding worlds. Harry suspects new dangers lie within Hogwarts.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledore's death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harry's home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestrange's clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledore's tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemort's soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix' vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: The year is 1926, and Newt Scamander has just completed a global excursion to find and document an extraordinary array of magical creatures. Arriving in New York for a brief stopover, he might have come and gone without incident, were it not for a No-Maj named Jacob, a misplaced magical case, and the escape of some of Newt's fantastic beasts, which could spell trouble for both the wizarding and No-Maj worlds.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: The return of Lord Voldemort wreaks havoc in both the Muggle and Wizarding worlds. Harry suspects new dangers lie within Hogwarts.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJ's sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the man's quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: You've Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late-night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies', everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Jake reunites with his brother, Elwood -- collectively known as the `Blues Brothers'. Jake's first task is to save the orphanage the brothers grew up in from closing, by raising 5000 dollars to pay back taxes. The two are convinced they can earn the money by getting their old band back together. However, after playing several gigs and making a few enemies, including the police, the brothers face daunting odds to deliver the money on time.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountant's trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Lighthearted adventures of a pair of news vendors in New York - one deaf, one blind - who go on the run when they are blamed for the murder of a customer. Each has seen - or heard - just a whiff of a clue, and a frantic chase ensues as the duo struggle to clear their names.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: After losing his position as a minor-league pitcher, Montgomery Brewster learns his great-uncle has left him 300 million dollars. To inherit it, Brewster must spend 30 million in 30 days under a complicated set of rules that forbid him from donating too much to charity or retaining any new assets when the period is up. Unable to share details about the will's odd conditions with anyone, Brewster sets out to spend his money under the stern eye of paralegal Angela Drake.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keeper's son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Dad's Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies', everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: It's the hottest day of the year and when Italian-American Sal refuses to make changes to his pizza parlour in the predominantly black community, tension and tempers mount.

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A soldier returns from Vietnam to find his boyhood friend, also a fellow soldier, in a military hospital, having suffered a mental breakdown in which he has become detached from reality and imagines that he is a bird.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. He's blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university. Yo help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over Thanksgiving. Frank's niece says this will be easy money, but she didn't foresee Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an American who endured the horrors of a Turkish prison after his arrest on drug charges.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: For Dan Gallagher, life is good. He is on the rise at his New York law firm, is happily married to his wife, Beth, and has a loving daughter. However, after a casual fling with a sultry book editor named Alex, everything changes. Jilted by Dan, Alex becomes unstable, her behaviour escalating from aggressive pursuit to obsessive stalking. Dan realises that his main problem is not hiding his affair, but rather saving himself and his family.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross is sent by her father-in-law, mogul RB Travis, to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly, Ross and a mismatched search party including scientist Dr Peter Elliot, treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka and a gorilla, discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: A whimsical but engaging western about a drifter who saves a woman from a gang of marauders. The cowboy is astonished to learn that the woman is a nun, especially when he witnesses her heavy drinking and cigar-smoking ways. The unlikely pair embarks on a voyage of discovery as they become embroiled in the Mexican War.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. He's blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university. Yo help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over Thanksgiving. Frank's niece says this will be easy money, but she didn't foresee Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A soldier returns from Vietnam to find his boyhood friend, also a fellow soldier, in a military hospital, having suffered a mental breakdown in which he has become detached from reality and imagines that he is a bird.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: The cynical commander of Allied Nations forces has to prevent a warlord from taking over the world. With 63 hostages held in his seemingly impregnable fortress, the warlord is demanding an outrageously hefty ransom.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hair's-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old man's notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A pair of transit policemen decide to raid a New York subway train loaded with money. Foster brothers John and Charlie have held a lifelong fantasy of robbing the network's money train, which collects millions of dollars each night from the city's subway stations. In addition to trying to deceive their boss, the boys must also contend with a beautiful new decoy cop.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. There's trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: Hondo Lane offers to keep an abandoned mother-son duo safe during an Apache attack. Along the way, he forms a strong bond with them. What challenges await them? Will they manage to survive?

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but he's shocked when his father stipulates he won't unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hair's-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade

Following clues in the old man's notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthor's nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone' in the first `Superman' movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helplessly.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kent's class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma, having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Nuclear Man, Lex Luthor's latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race and sees the android, which is made from Kryptonite, as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross is sent by her father-in-law, mogul RB Travis, to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly, Ross and a mismatched search party including scientist Dr Peter Elliot, treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka and a gorilla, discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: High Plains Drifter
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger rides into a small frontier town in the American southwest, provoked into a gunfight in which he kills three men, and then begged by the townsfolk to become sheriff. The residents are terrified of the gunslinger but live in greater fear of a gang which intends to wipe out the whole town.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthor's nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. programme.title: Superman III
