programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all – the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: Their Draconic Majesty's Request
programme.desc: The mystery bounty hunter tracks Ras and Arin to the World Forest, while the Ninja search for the last Prismatic Blade.

programme.title: Crashing Together
programme.desc: Arin must choose between Ras and the Ninja as the battle for the Prismatic Blades rages across the World Forest.

programme.title: Beasts And Dragons, Rise Of Garmadon
programme.desc: Zane, Jay, and Kai remember some of Ninjago's fearsome creatures so that Cole defend the cave from an unidentified monster. But Ninja confront memories of their greatest villain and ally, Garmadon, before the threat to Zane controls him completely.

programme.title: Pteranodon't!
programme.desc: A young park guest accidentally strands himself in the Pteranodon aviary, requiring Owen and a testy Stygimoloch to stage a daring rescue.

programme.title: A Tale of Two Teos
programme.desc: Mateo and Zoey are captured by the Night Hunter and must free Z-Blob to rescue their friends at Castle Nocturnia from a terrible fate.

programme.title: Adventures in Robot-Sitting
programme.desc: The Never Witch's sudden assault forces the dream chasers to split up. While the main team rushes to the mysterious Dunes of Duralumina, Nova and Sneak are left behind to defend.

programme.title: Personal Space Invaders
programme.desc: With the Never Witch on the loose, the dream chasers head to Oz and Albert's landing to use Oz's enchanted telescope. But what should have been?

programme.title: Secret Crush
programme.desc: Aliya and Liann take matters into their own hands as they go undercover to solve the mystery of Ley-La, the secretive and enigmatic figure who's been lurking around the periphery of their lives. Posing as reporters, they dig deep and discover a key clue.

programme.title: Tick Tock
programme.desc: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble on a hidden work shop where Zane learns the secret about his past and in the process, finally knowing who he is, he is the first ninja to unlock his true potential.

programme.title: Marvel Black Panther Trouble in Wakanda
programme.desc: Being the King of Wakanda is tough -- especially when you're also the Black Panther! When Thanos arrives from outer space and threatens to destroy Earth, the Black Panther leaps into action and defeats him with the help of Earth's Mightiest Heroes. But the situation only gets worse when rogue villains Killmonger and Klaue team up with the Mad Titan to take the fight to Black Panther's homeland! Can the Panther pounce on their perilous plan before Wakanda is pulverized?

programme.title: The Maze Of Amazement
programme.desc: The Knights find themselves trapped in a maze looking for the Book of Deception. But will they actually get their hands on it, or will it keep deceiving them? The Knights travel to the Hill Country in the northern part of Knighton to Axl's home town of DIGGINGTON (where they realize that all of Axl's family look just like him.) While they're there, Merlok 2.0 detects something…one of the Magic Books! It's “The Book of Deception.” They go to find it and discover it ended up under a mountain. And, to make matters worse, the magic book has built a maze around itself to keep it from being found (it is deceptive!) As the NEXO-Knights enter the maze from one side, Jestro enters from the other the Book of Monsters has led him to the maze to get The Book of Deception, too. It's a race through this confusing maze to see who can get the book first. Ava figures out the maze is the Whackman maze from a videogame. After help from Axl's people to defeat Jestro and win the book, the knights discover

programme.title: The Hundred Year Moon
programme.desc: At the night of the Hundred Year Moon, the Wolves are running wild and causing havoc. Crooler kidnaps a young gorilla girl to lure Laval, Eris and Gorzan the Gorilla out to rescue her. It is a very dangerous night, but finally Skinnet the Skunk's foul odor may prove useful.

programme.title: Fish Story!

programme.title: The Royal Blacksmiths

programme.title: Marvel Superheroes
programme.desc: Loki arrives at Avengers Tower declaring he wants to be an Avenger. Our heroes are skeptical, but Iron Man decides to make Loki an ”Avenger In Training”. It's a great plan until Thanos arrives on Earth looking for Loki

programme.title: The Book Of Total Badness
programme.desc: The NEXO-Knights must fight Jestro's Monsters of Destruction which are attacking all over the Kingdom. But Merlok smells a trap…is he right? In a dark, destroyed part of the kingdom, Jestro arrives at the ruins of a HUGE castle. The Book of Monsters knows this place: the great evil wizard Monstrux lived here. The Book sniffs out some powerful magic in the ruins: “The Book of Destruction.” With this, The Book tells Jestro they can destroy the NEXO-Knights and then attack the King's Castle and cause massive destruction. Jestro creates destructive monsters and sends them all over the realm, so the Knights must separate and fight single combats all over the place. The Knights lose these battles (lesson: they have to work as a team!) And, just when the Knights are scattered across the Kingdom, Jestro attacks the King's Castle! It looks like all is lost. When Aaron, who has escaped, returns to see Jestro's attack, he realizes he must gather his fellow Knights. Merlok says it's very dangerous

programme.title: Gorilla's Gone Wild
programme.desc: Cragger angers the Gorilla tribe and they march to the Crocodile Swamp to teach him a lesson. But the Gorilla Mechs are not fit for the swampy water and the Lions and Eagles must come to the rescue. The only problem is that the Lions don't like water ... at all!

programme.title: The Haunted and the Hunted!
programme.desc: Something mysterious lurking the jungle wrecks a construction site, and Hudson is convinced a ghost is responsible - but it might be something even more surprising.

programme.title: The Snowball Effect
programme.desc: Laval and Li'Ella's relationship grows as he gives her a tour of the Lion City. But distracted, he misses a key battle against the Hunters. Tormak joins the fight and saves the day. But the Lion King Lagravis is captured and brought to the Ice Fort. Who will lead the Lions now?!?

programme.title: Chaos Unchained
programme.desc: The Ninja hurry to the First Land to stop the Forbidden Five from freeing ThunderFang, and Wyldfyre discovers a drastic cure to Roby's decay.

programme.title: The Shatter Dragon
programme.desc: ThunderFang is freed, and only the Ninja stand between the Shatter Dragon of Chaos and his revenge.

programme.title: Prophecy Of The Green Ninja, Greatest Battles
programme.desc: So the final puzzle forces ninja to question the true meaning of the Green Ninja Prophecy. Solving the puzzles releases a new peril for the Ninja to face. Will memories of their greatest victories be enough to defeat it?

programme.title: The Power and the Peril!
programme.desc: Rock star mathematician Ian Malcolm returns to Isla Nublar and helps Claire, Owen and Hudson deal with strange power surges all over Jurassic World.

programme.title: Fistful of Doppelgangers
programme.desc: The Candy Realm is under siege, and the dream chasers are tasked with saving its sugary inhabitants. As they orchestrate a mass evacuation, Mateo and Astrid sneak into the Midnight Raven.

programme.title: Irrational Treasure
programme.desc: The elusive Eye of Confusion has been located, but the dream chasers are not alone in their pursuit. With the Never Witch's doppelgangers on their heels, the team embarks on a frantic treasure hunt.

programme.title: Mission Inplausible
programme.desc: As the Eye of Confusion's power threatens to unravel reality, Logan and Astrid are forced to confront their deepest fears in the Dream Forge.

programme.title: Music “Battle of the Stars”
programme.desc: Nova pulls off a series of pranks, leaving her friends scrambling and laughing. However, things take a dark turn when one of her pranks goes awry and sends the group into a terrifying situation.

programme.title: The Royal Blacksmiths
programme.desc: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win “The Blade Cup” where one of the fang blades is hidden.

programme.title: Marvel Superheroes
programme.desc: Loki arrives at Avengers Tower declaring he wants to be an Avenger. Our heroes are skeptical, but Iron Man decides to make Loki an ”Avenger In Training”. It's a great plan until Thanos arrives on Earth looking for Loki

programme.title: The Book Of Total Badness
programme.desc: The NEXO-Knights must fight Jestro's Monsters of Destruction which are attacking all over the Kingdom. But Merlok smells a trap…is he right? In a dark, destroyed part of the kingdom, Jestro arrives at the ruins of a HUGE castle. The Book of Monsters knows this place: the great evil wizard Monstrux lived here. The Book sniffs out some powerful magic in the ruins: “The Book of Destruction.” With this, The Book tells Jestro they can destroy the NEXO-Knights and then attack the King's Castle and cause massive destruction. Jestro creates destructive monsters and sends them all over the realm, so the Knights must separate and fight single combats all over the place. The Knights lose these battles (lesson: they have to work as a team!) And, just when the Knights are scattered across the Kingdom, Jestro attacks the King's Castle! It looks like all is lost. When Aaron, who has escaped, returns to see Jestro's attack, he realizes he must gather his fellow Knights. Merlok says it's very dangerous

programme.desc: Cragger angers the Gorilla tribe and they march to the Crocodile Swamp to teach him a lesson. But the Gorilla Mechs are not fit for the swampy water and the Lions and Eagles must come to the rescue. The only problem is that the Lions don't like water ... at all!

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Two children are making Christmas crackers for each other. Dipsy is very pleased to find his present is a cracker. He looks for someone to pull the cracker. It makes a lovely pink bang and the Teletubbies laugh when they fall over.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: A voice trumpet appears and teaches the Teletubbies a winter nursery rhyme. Po's present is a little frosty cloud that begins to snow. All the Teletubbies laugh as they play in the snow.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies see some children visit a level crossing and watch a train pass by. The Teletubbies play their Ready, Steady, Go game.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies play a slide game before watching Becky and Jed look for eggs on their farm. Then their mum cooks them for their tea. In Teletubbyland, the Lion and Bear play their hide and seek game.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Alex Pascall and some children sing to their dolls to rock them to sleep. Laa-Laa wants to sing a lovely song, but Tinky Winky is crunching his Tubby Toast too loudly!

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Laa-Laa dances with her ball. A little boy tells us why he likes to live in his block of flats. A balloon appears in Teletubbyland. The Teletubbies follow a balloon.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies giggle as they play their 'Through the Arch' game. The windmill stops them to watch a little girl and her dad go for a walk in the town.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies line up to say 'Eh-oh' and then watch Matthew and Mark feed a baby calf. The Teletubbies play a game to see who can eat their Tubby Custard the slowest, but Po can't wait and eats her Tubby Custard very fast.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies and some children watch Tamzin Griffin pretend to be Funny Lady and tell the story of the Naughty Pig. Dipsy's hat keeps blowing away and he has to chase it all over Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Tubbies crawl through the arch in Home Hill and watch Alex Pascall and some children sing 'Handy Hands'.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children play with balls of different shapes and sizes. In Teletubbyland, something happens to Dipsy's hat.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: It's time for the Teletubbies to do their exercises. A voice trumpet rises and the Teletubbies stretch up and down to it's instructions.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children learn about the number two. Dipsy and Laa-Laa are eating Tubby Toast. They play the game 'Two Little Teletubbies', but while they are playing the Noo-Noo tidies up their Tubby Toast.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies are eating Tubby Toast. They stop to watch Amy making pasta. A ball of string appears in Teletubbyland. Po knocks the string in to the air with her scooter and it makes a stringy mess all over Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky calls the other Tubbies to come and watch Tamzin Griffin pretend to be Funny Lady and tell the story about the naughty sock. The Tubby Toast machine makes a tower of tubby toast.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children looking at penguins waddling and swimming. In Teletubbyland, the Tubbies play walk fast and slow, far and near and other different ways.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies play 'Boo', but stop to watch Ned help his dad plant and water some geraniums. In Teletubbyland, nine pretty flowers and a watering can appear.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Samira and her friends show the Teletubbies their gymnastic routines. The Teletubbies do their own gymnastics.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch Matthew and James help their uncle milk the cows. In Teletubbyland, the Tubby Custard machine isn't working, so they sing a special 'Tubby Custard' song. Then, the Tubby Custard machine works again.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: A voice trumpet appears and the Teletubbies dance, before watching two girls do some Flamenco dancing with their teacher. It's time for the Teletubbies to wash their feet. They love using their Tubby Sponges.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Tubbies watch a little boy peel and mash some eggs for an egg mayonnaise sandwich. The Teletubbies laugh when they make a tune whilst eating their Tubby Custard.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Dipsy says "Eh-oh" and runs off to find the other Tubbies. They watch some children make fantastic animals from papermache.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Tubbies watch a little girl who loves monkeys help her mum feed them in a zoo. Tinky Winky sits down to eat some Tubby Toast.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky says "Eh-oh". The Teletubbies and some children watch Tamzin Griffin pretend to be the Funny Lady and tell the story of the naughty hat. The Teletubbies are very happy when they find their favourite things to play with.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: In Teletubbyland, the Tubbies are trying to be quiet. They watch Oscar read the story of the Gingerbread Boy to his brother Felix. A voice trumpet appears and sings the nursery rhyme.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies dance an up and down dance. They watch some children painting pictures and patterns on to eggs. In Teletubbyland, Laa-Laa dances with her ball until the magical tree appears.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa-Laa sit down to eat some Tubby Custard. Po wants some too. She tries to eat the other's Tubby Custard, but they won't let her.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch a little boy show us how to make a Turban. The Tubbies go for a walk, but Po, Laa-Laa and Dipsy want to play with their favourite things.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: A voice trumpet rises and teaches the Teletubbies a nursery rhyme. Then they watch Becky go for a ride on a Tram. Po rides her scooter too fast and knocks the other Tubbies over.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies pop up from behind a hill to watch Tamzin Griffin pretend to be Funny Lady and tell the story of the naughty sausage. Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Po go for a walk, so Laa-Laa decides to dance a secret dance.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies want to go to sleep, but Tinky Winky finds Po already asleep in his bed. So he goes to look for somewhere else to sleep.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children learn about the number three. Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa-Laa go for a walk. They count three trees and three flowers and Po follows behind counting too.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies are asleep when a voice trumpet appears singing the rhyme 'Frére Jacques'. The Teletubbies laugh and call "Again, again!"

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch two boys make Chinese Lanterns with their uncle. In Teletubbyland, it is time for Tubby Toast, but where has Laa-Laa's toast gone?

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: A voice trumpet rises and makes the Teletubbies laugh. They watch some children exploring the colour green. The Teletubbies love green.

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: According to Jim
programme.desc: Dana's new boyfriend (guest star Brad Paisley) is an amazing musician who can get Jim the gig of his dreams -- once Andy is out of the way.

programme.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
programme.desc: Convinced that mutants pose a threat to humanity, Dr. Bolivar Trask (Peter Dinklage) develops the Sentinels, enormous robotic weapons that can detect a mutant gene and zero in on that person. In the 21st century, the Sentinels have evolved into highly efficient killing machines. With mutants now facing extinction, Wolverine (Hugh Jackman) volunteers to go back in time and rally the X-Men of the past to help change a pivotal moment in history and thereby save their future.

programme.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
programme.desc: Seeking solace from his dark past, Logan (Hugh Jackman), better known as Wolverine, seems to have found love and contentment with Kayla Silverfox (Lynn Collins). Logan's peaceful existence is shattered when Victor Creed (Liev Schreiber), his vicious brother, brutally murders Kayla. Logan's thirst for revenge propels him into the Weapon X program, where he undergoes a painful procedure to bond his bones with adamantium, making him virtually indestructible and more than a match for Victor.

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Worshiped as a god since the dawn of civilization, the immortal Apocalypse (Oscar Isaac) becomes the first and most powerful mutant. Awakening after thousands of years, he recruits the disheartened Magneto (Michael Fassbender) and other mutants to create a new world order. As the fate of the Earth hangs in the balance, Professor X (James McAvoy) and Raven (Jennifer Lawrence) lead a team of young X-Men to stop their seemingly invincible nemesis from destroying mankind.

programme.title: The Wolverine
programme.desc: Lured to a Japan he hasn't seen since World War II, century-old mutant Wolverine (Hugh Jackman) finds himself in a shadowy realm of yakuza and samurai. Wolverine is pushed to his physical and emotional brink when he is forced to go on the run with a powerful industrialist's daughter (Tao Okamoto) and is confronted -- for the first time -- with the prospect of death. As he struggles to rediscover the hero within himself, he must grapple with powerful foes and the ghosts of his own haunted past.

programme.title: Deadpool
programme.desc: Wade Wilson (Ryan Reynolds) is a former Special Forces operative who now works as a mercenary. His world comes crashing down when evil scientist Ajax (Ed Skrein) tortures, disfigures and transforms him into Deadpool. The rogue experiment leaves Deadpool with accelerated healing powers and a twisted sense of humor. With help from mutant allies Colossus and Negasonic Teenage Warhead (Brianna Hildebrand), Deadpool uses his new skills to hunt down the man who nearly destroyed his life.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: As the Fourth of July nears, satellite engineer David Levinson (Jeff Goldblum) investigates a 3,000-mile-wide mother ship that's approaching Earth. Fortunately, 20 years earlier, nations across the world started to use recovered extraterrestrial technology to develop an immense defense program. When the alien invaders attack with unprecedented force, the U.S. president, teams of scientists and brave fighter pilots spring into action to save the planet from a seemingly invincible enemy.

programme.title: Alien vs. Predator
programme.desc: When the wealthy and ambitious Charles Bishop Weyland (Lance Henriksen) funds an expedition to Antarctica, he hopes to find a mysterious source of heat that has been detected. Led by a tough guide, Alexa Woods (Sanaa Lathan), Weyland and his team uncover a pyramid, but they also find malevolent parasitic aliens. Making matters worse, another extraterrestrial species, known as Predators, arrive to hunt the other aliens, with the humans caught in the middle of the conflict.

programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: New York City policeman John McClane (Bruce Willis) is visiting his estranged wife (Bonnie Bedelia) and two daughters on Christmas Eve. He joins her at a holiday party in the headquarters of the Japanese-owned business she works for. But the festivities are interrupted by a group of terrorists who take over the exclusive high-rise, and everyone in it. Very soon McClane realizes that there's no one to save the hostages -- but him.

programme.title: Die Hard 2
programme.desc: A year after his heroics in L.A, detective John McClane (Bruce Willis) is mixed up in another terrorist plot, this time at Washington Dulles International Airport, where he is waiting for his wife (Bonnie Bedelia). That same night, South American politico and drug profiteer Ramon Esperanza (Franco Nero) is arriving in U.S. custody. McClane takes action when a treasonous ex-colonel (William Sadler) seizes control of the airport, threatening to crash every inbound flight unless Esperanza is freed.

programme.title: Die Hard With a Vengeance
programme.desc: Detective John McClane (Bruce Willis) is now divorced, alcoholic and jobless after getting fired for his reckless behavior and bad attitude. He is called back into action, however, when a cryptic terrorist (Jeremy Irons) takes New York City hostage in a lethal game of "Simon Says" and refuses to speak with anyone but McClane. Teaming up with a street-savvy electrician named Zeus Carver (Samuel L. Jackson), McClane dashes through the city, trying to stay one step ahead of a murderous plot.

programme.title: Live Free or Die Hard
programme.desc: As the nation prepares to celebrate Independence Day, veteran cop John McClane (Bruce Willis) carries out another routine assignment: bringing in a computer hacker (Justin Long) for questioning. Meanwhile, a tech-savvy villain named Thomas Gabriel (Timothy Olyphant) launches an attack on America's computer infrastructure. As chaos descends around him, McClane must use old-fashioned methods to fight the high-tech threat.

programme.title: A Good Day to Die Hard
programme.desc: New York City cop John McClane (Bruce Willis) arrives in Moscow to track down his estranged son, Jack (Jai Courtney). McClane thinks his son is a criminal, so it comes as a shock when he learns that Jack is actually working undercover to protect Komarov (Sebastian Koch), a Russian government whistleblower. With their own lives on the line, McClane and Jack must overcome their differences in order to get Komarov to safety and thwart a potentially disastrous crime in the Chernobyl region.

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: Historian and code-breaker Ben Gates (Nicolas Cage) has been searching his whole life for a rumored treasure dating back to the creation of the United States. Joining an expedition led by fellow treasure hunter Ian Howe (Sean Bean), Gates finds an ice-locked Colonial ship in the Arctic Circle that contains a clue linking the treasure to the Declaration of Independence. But when Howe betrays him, Gates has to race to get to the document ahead of his so-called colleague.

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: When a long-missing page from the diary of assassin John Wilkes Booth suddenly resurfaces, it implicates the great-great grandfather of treasure hunter Ben Gates (Nicolas Cage) as a conspirator in Lincoln's death. Ben's globetrotting quest to prove his ancestor's innocence leads him to a closely guarded book containing the nation's deepest secrets.

programme.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
programme.desc: With help from old and new allies, Dr. Stephen Strange travels into the multiverse to face a mysterious adversary.

programme.title: America's 250th Anniversary Silver and Complete Eagle Date Run Set from CSN Mint!
programme.desc: Join your hosts at CSN mint for a celebration of America's 250th Anniversary with Silver and a complete collection of Burnished Silver American Eagles individually numbered exclusively from CSN Mint!

programme.desc: Regain independence and enjoy greater mobility with the compact design and long-lasting battery of portable oxygen.

programme.title: Overwhelmed with IRS Debt? Keys to Resolving Tax Debt
programme.desc: See how one company is changing people's lives by helping them put their tax problems to rest.

programme.title: Transform Your Daily Life
programme.desc: Join Connie Craig-Carrol and health expert Ken Meares in this eye-opening discussion about OmegaXL. Learn how this unique supplement can help you fight the limitations of joint pain and embrace an active lifestyle.

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: After the death of his father, T'Challa returns home to the African nation of Wakanda to take his rightful place as king. When a powerful enemy suddenly reappears, T'Challa's mettle as king -- and as Black Panther -- gets tested when he's drawn into a conflict that puts the fate of Wakanda and the entire world at risk. Faced with treachery and danger, the young king must rally his allies and release the full power of Black Panther to defeat his foes and secure the safety of his people.

programme.title: Live: UFC 321: Aspinall vs. Gane - Prelims
programme.desc: Abdul-Kareem Al-Selwady vs. Matheus Camilo, lightweight; Ludovit Klein vs. Mateusz Rebecki, lightweight; Ikram Aliskerov vs. JunYong Park, middleweight; Nasrat Haqparast vs. Quillan Salkilld, lightweight. From Etihad Arena in Abu Dhabi, UAE.

programme.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
programme.desc: Queen Ramonda, Shuri, M'Baku, Okoye and the Dora Milaje fight to protect their nation from intervening world powers in the wake of King T'Challa's death. As the Wakandans strive to embrace their next chapter, the heroes must band together with Nakia and Everett Ross to forge a new path for their beloved kingdom.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: Brash space adventurer Peter Quill (Chris Pratt) finds himself the quarry of relentless bounty hunters after he steals an orb coveted by Ronan, a powerful villain. To evade Ronan, Quill is forced into an uneasy truce with four disparate misfits: gun-toting Rocket Raccoon, treelike-humanoid Groot, enigmatic Gamora, and vengeance-driven Drax the Destroyer. But when he discovers the orb's true power and the cosmic threat it poses, Quill must rally his ragtag group to save the universe.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
programme.desc: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill must rally his team to defend the universe and protect one of their own. If the mission is not completely successful, it could possibly lead to the end of the Guardians as we know them.

programme.title: Ant-Man and The Wasp
programme.desc: Scott Lang is grappling with the consequences of his choices as both a superhero and a father. Approached by Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym, Lang must once again don the Ant-Man suit and fight alongside the Wasp. The urgent mission soon leads to secret revelations from the past as the dynamic duo find themselves in an epic battle against a powerful new enemy.

programme.title: In Like Flint
programme.desc: Former Z.O.W.I.E. spy Derek Flint (James Coburn) is called back from retirement after his former spy chief, Lloyd C. Cramden (Lee J. Cobb), is framed for prurient behavior with a prostitute, and U.S. President Trent (Andrew Duggan) experiences an incident of "lost time." After Flint discovers irregularities on a recently launched space-station mission, he realizes that an international conspiracy is afoot. He travels the world and assumes myriad disguises to unravel the nefarious plot.

programme.title: House of Bamboo
programme.desc: In post-World War II Tokyo, Eddie Kenner (Robert Stack) is on a U.S. Army special assignment to investigate a murderous clique led by ex-soldier Sandy Dawson (Robert Ryan). Kenner ingratiates himself with Dawson and his inner circle, gaining their trust while starting a relationship with Mariko (Shirley Yamaguchi), the wife of a murdered gang member. But the sinister Dawson suspects there's a traitor among them when the police are tipped off about a planned robbery.

programme.title: Soldier of Fortune
programme.desc: Jane Hoyt (Susan Hayward) comes to Hong Kong to find her husband, Louis (Gene Barry), a photojournalist who has been missing for three months. Learning he is being held captive by the Chinese government, she seeks the help of smuggler Hank Lee (Clark Gable), who has a shady reputation for being able to get anything done. Jane and Hank are instantly attracted to each other, but Jane will not abandon her husband. To win her heart, Hank must find a way to rescue Louis.

programme.title: The Sand Pebbles
programme.desc: In 1926, the USS San Pablo patrols the Yangtze River during the clashes between Chiang Kai-shek's communists and Chinese warlords. Eight-year veteran machinist Jake Holman (Steve McQueen), new to the self-named sand pebbles crew, immediately draws deep suspicion due to his independent streak. Ordered to protect Americans, including schoolteacher Shirley Eckhart (Candice Bergen), Jake and the gunboat crew are unwittingly drawn into a bitter nationalistic feud that holds grim consequences.

programme.title: The Blue Max
programme.desc: Lt. Bruno Stachel (George Peppard), a brash German World War I fighter pilot, is driven to shoot down 20 enemy planes, thus garnering him the Blue Max, a coveted medal. His superior, Count von Klugermann (James Mason), is aware that Bruno will stop at nothing to receive the honor, and admires his tenacity. The count's nephew, Willi (Jeremy Kemp), is Bruno's main competition for the prize, but Bruno is determined to eliminate his adversary and secure the honor for himself.

programme.title: Reign of Fire
programme.desc: In present-day London, 12-year-old Quinn watches as his mother wakes an enormous fire-breathing beast from its centuries-long slumber. Twenty years later, much of the world has been scarred by the beast and its offspring. As a fire chief, Quinn (Christian Bale) is responsible for warding off the beasts and keeping a community alive as they eke out a meager existence. Into their midst comes a hotshot American, Van Zan (Matthew McConaughey), who says he has a way to kill the beasts.

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: Dutch, a soldier of fortune, is hired by the U.S. government to secretly rescue a group of politicians trapped in Guatemala. But when Dutch and his team, which includes weapons expert Blain and CIA agent George, land in Central America, something is wrong. After finding a string of dead bodies, the crew discovers they are being hunted by a brutal creature with superhuman strength and the ability to disappear into its surroundings.

programme.title: Predator 2
programme.desc: Los Angeles is enduring a heat wave and a crime wave, so the pressure on police officer Michael Harrigan (Danny Glover) to solve a strange string of murders is mounting. Harrigan thinks the culprit can be found among the warring gangs and drug cartels, but FBI Special Agent Peter Keyes (Gary Busey) knows the horrible truth: Their killer is a fearsome extraterrestrial (Kevin Peter Hall) with keen hunting abilities that include superior night vision and the power to make itself invisible.

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: Brought together on a mysterious planet, a mercenary (Adrien Brody) and a group of coldblooded killers now become the prey. A new breed of aliens pursues the ragtag humans through dense jungle. The group must work together to survive, or become the latest trophies of the fearsome intergalactic hunters.

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: After climatologist Jack Hall is largely ignored by U.N. officials when presenting his environmental concerns, his research proves true when a superstorm develops, setting off catastrophic natural disasters throughout the world; trying to get to his son, Sam, who is trapped in New York with his friend Laura and others, Jack and his crew must travel by foot from Philadelphia, braving the elements, to get to Sam before it's too late.

programme.title: Reign of Fire
programme.desc: In present-day London, 12-year-old Quinn watches as his mother wakes an enormous fire-breathing beast from its centuries-long slumber. Twenty years later, much of the world has been scarred by the beast and its offspring. As a fire chief, Quinn (Christian Bale) is responsible for warding off the beasts and keeping a community alive as they eke out a meager existence. Into their midst comes a hotshot American, Van Zan (Matthew McConaughey), who says he has a way to kill the beasts.

programme.title: The Story of Ruth
programme.desc: As a child, Ruth (Elana Eden) is sold to a group of pagans and reared to be a priestess to their gods and idols. But, as an adult, she meets the Hebrew Mahlon (Tom Tryon), and is intrigued by his morality and monotheism. She eventually falls in love with him and adopts his faith. However, the couple soon find themselves persecuted -- Mahlon is imprisoned and Ruth is cast into the wilderness. After Ruth's attempt to free Mahlon goes horribly wrong, she redoubles her commitment to God.

programme.title: Desiree
programme.desc: Desiree Clary (Jean Simmons) has met the love of her life, and his name is Napoleon Bonaparte (Marlon Brando). But their love is a difficult one, as Napoleon's rise through the military ranks takes him away from her, and they both eventually marry other people. Years later, as Napoleon seems destined to rule the known world, the two cross paths again and attempt to rekindle their romance. But when Napoleon's reign comes to a end, their relationship may not be able to survive.

programme.title: The Model and the Marriage Broker
programme.desc: In New York, Mae Swasey (Thelma Ritter) practices the delicate art of matchmaking. When a handsome optician, Matt Hornbeck (Scott Brady), stands up his original match at the altar, Mae quickly sees an opportunity to put him with the more suitable Kitty Bennett (Jeanne Crain), a model and shop owner. Although Matt is reluctant to be tied down, he falls in love with Kitty and all goes well -- until the couple, neither of whom have known what Mae does, suddenly finds out about her profession.

programme.title: The Wayward Bus
programme.desc: An ex-stripper (Jayne Mansfield), a trinket salesman (Dan Dailey) and others ride a California bus.

programme.title: The Best of Everything
programme.desc: Three ambitious working girls of 1950s Manhattan share their secretarial work and later a home together: Gregg (Suzy Parker) is an aspiring actress whose director is using her; April (Diane Baker) is left pregnant and alone; and Caroline (Hope Lange) finds solace in the arms of an editor (Stephen Boyd). Together the three contend with romantic disappointments, office politics and the threat that their dreams for a fulfilling career will be cut short by marriage, children and inertia.

programme.title: Kiss Me Goodbye
programme.desc: Kay (Sally Field) is a widow who's met a handsome but otherwise dull Egyptologist named Rupert (Jeff Bridges) and hopes to marry. Trouble is, the ghost of her dead husband, Jolly (James Caan), strenuously objects. A former Broadway director, he's visible only to Kay, and begins interfering in her life so much that others question her sanity. Jolly, however, cares only about driving away the hated Rupert, who for his part thinks to stage an exorcism.

programme.title: No Hard Feelings
programme.desc: On the brink of losing her childhood home, a desperate woman agrees to date a wealthy couple's introverted and awkward 19-year-old son. However, he proves to be more of a challenge than she expected, and time is running out before she loses it all.

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: Despite having solid field training, CIA analyst Susan Cooper (Melissa McCarthy) has spent her entire career as a desk jockey, working hand-in-hand with dashing agent Bradley Fine (Jude Law). Using high-tech equipment and a hidden earpiece, Susan is the guardian angel who helps Bradley avoid danger. However, when Bradley is assassinated by Bulgarian arms dealer Rayna Boyanov (Rose Byrne), Susan wrangles her way into her first undercover assignment to help capture Boyanov and avenge Bradley.

programme.title: The Machine
programme.desc: The past comes back to haunt Bert Kreischer when a murderous mobster tries to kidnap him to atone for his crimes. With help from his estranged father, Bert must retrace the steps of his younger self as a sociopathic crime family goes to war.

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: Ted's (Ben Stiller) dream prom date with Mary (Cameron Diaz) never happens due to an embarrassing injury at her home. Years later, Ted hires Pat Healy (Matt Dillon) to track down Mary so he can reconnect with her. Pat lies to Ted about Mary and he finds out everything he can about her to trick her into dating him. Ted travels to meet Mary and has to weave through the web of lies that Pat and Mary's friend Tucker (Lee Evans) have woven to try and win her over.

programme.title: The Machine
programme.desc: The past comes back to haunt Bert Kreischer when a murderous mobster tries to kidnap him to atone for his crimes. With help from his estranged father, Bert must retrace the steps of his younger self as a sociopathic crime family goes to war.

programme.title: No Hard Feelings
programme.desc: On the brink of losing her childhood home, a desperate woman agrees to date a wealthy couple's introverted and awkward 19-year-old son. However, he proves to be more of a challenge than she expected, and time is running out before she loses it all.

programme.title: State Fair
programme.desc: A brother (Pat Boone) and sister (Pamela Tiffin) find romance and good clean fun at the state fair in Dallas.

programme.title: Satan Never Sleeps
programme.desc: The Communist People's Party makes life difficult for mission priests Rev. O'Banion (William Holden) and Rev. Bovard (Clifton Webb) in 1940s China. The cook for their mission, young local Siu Lan (France Nuyen), is in love with O'Banion, but her innocence is lost when the communist forces of leader Ho San (Weaver Lee) raid and decimate the mission. Ho San continues to persecute the priests, but struggles with his communist ideology when he receives disturbing orders from his leaders.

programme.title: Something for the Boys
programme.desc: Three cousins (Carmen Miranda, Michael O'Shea, Vivian Blaine) must travel to Kentucky to claim Magnolia Manor, a plantation they have inherited. They are disappointed to find it in shambles. But things start to look up for them when Sgt. Rocky Fulton offers to fix up the place, on one condition: that they make it into a boarding house for military wives. To raise funds, they decide to perform various musical numbers, and, in the midst of preparations, a love affair begins to blossom.

programme.title: Call Me Mister
programme.desc: A song-and-dance man stationed in Japan during the Korean War goes AWOL to follow his wife on the USO circuit.

programme.title: Crash Dive
programme.desc: German submarines are targeting Allied vessels in the Atlantic, and in the midst of the fighting, a pair of American Naval officers might be embarking on a very different kind of collision course. After a chance meeting, Lt. Ward Stewart (Tyrone Power) has fallen for Jean Hewlett (Anne Baxter), a New England teacher who happens to have the eye of Ward's Navy boss, Lt. Cmdr. Dewey Connors (Dana Andrews). But love will have to wait while the men work to help win World War II.

programme.title: Project X
programme.desc: As punishment for a minor offense, the Air Force assigns pilot Jimmy Garrett (Matthew Broderick) to watch over a group of chimpanzees used for military experiments. Jimmy bonds with Virgil, a chimp capable of communicating with sign language. But when he witnesses the military's plan to kill the animals with radiation, Jimmy enlists the help of Teri MacDonald (Helen Hunt), the graduate student responsible for teaching sign language to Virgil, to free the chimps.

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: Dutch, a soldier of fortune, is hired by the U.S. government to secretly rescue a group of politicians trapped in Guatemala. But when Dutch and his team, which includes weapons expert Blain and CIA agent George, land in Central America, something is wrong. After finding a string of dead bodies, the crew discovers they are being hunted by a brutal creature with superhuman strength and the ability to disappear into its surroundings.

programme.title: Predator 2
programme.desc: Los Angeles is enduring a heat wave and a crime wave, so the pressure on police officer Michael Harrigan (Danny Glover) to solve a strange string of murders is mounting. Harrigan thinks the culprit can be found among the warring gangs and drug cartels, but FBI Special Agent Peter Keyes (Gary Busey) knows the horrible truth: Their killer is a fearsome extraterrestrial (Kevin Peter Hall) with keen hunting abilities that include superior night vision and the power to make itself invisible.

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: Brought together on a mysterious planet, a mercenary (Adrien Brody) and a group of coldblooded killers now become the prey. A new breed of aliens pursues the ragtag humans through dense jungle. The group must work together to survive, or become the latest trophies of the fearsome intergalactic hunters.

programme.title: The Predator
programme.desc: From the outer reaches of space to the small-town streets of suburbia, the hunt comes home. The universe's most lethal hunters are stronger, smarter and deadlier than ever before, having genetically upgraded themselves with DNA from other species. When a boy accidentally triggers their return to Earth, only a ragtag crew of ex-soldiers and a disgruntled science teacher can prevent the end of the human race.

programme.title: Alien vs. Predator
programme.desc: When the wealthy and ambitious Charles Bishop Weyland (Lance Henriksen) funds an expedition to Antarctica, he hopes to find a mysterious source of heat that has been detected. Led by a tough guide, Alexa Woods (Sanaa Lathan), Weyland and his team uncover a pyramid, but they also find malevolent parasitic aliens. Making matters worse, another extraterrestrial species, known as Predators, arrive to hunt the other aliens, with the humans caught in the middle of the conflict.

programme.title: Heebie Jeebies

programme.title: Firestarter

Her father taught her how to defuse her power, but as Charlie turns 11, the fire becomes harder and harder to control. When a mysterious operative finally finds the family, he tries to seize Charlie once and for all -- but she has other plans.

programme.title: Flatliners
programme.desc: Five medical students embark on a daring and dangerous experiment to gain insight into the mystery of what lies beyond the confines of life. The bold adventure begins when they trigger near-death experiences by stopping their hearts for short periods of time. As their trials become more perilous, each must confront the sins from their past while facing the paranormal consequences of journeying to the other side.

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw 3D
programme.desc: Decades ago, residents of Newt, Texas, long suspected that the Sawyer family was responsible for the disappearances of many people. When their suspicions finally were confirmed, vigilantes torched the Sawyer compound and killed every member of the family -- or so they thought. Much later, a young woman named Heather (Alexandra Daddario) learns that she has inherited Texas property from an unknown relative, and she is unaware of horrors that await in the mansion's dank cellar.

programme.title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre Part 2
programme.desc: Chainsaw-wielding maniac Leatherface (Bill Johnson) is up to his cannibalistic ways once again, along with the rest of his twisted clan, including the equally disturbed Chop-Top (Bill Moseley). This time, the masked killer has set his sights on pretty disc jockey Vanita "Stretch" Brock (Caroline Williams), who teams up with Texas lawman Lefty Enright (Dennis Hopper) to battle the psychopath and his family deep within their lair, a macabre abandoned amusement park.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 3
programme.desc: A sergeant and his task force embark on a mission to destroy the Creeper on its last day of feeding. The Creeper soon fights back when they get close to discovering its mysterious and dark origins.

programme.title: Glass
programme.desc: David Dunn tries to stay one step ahead of the law while delivering vigilante justice on the streets of Philadelphia. His special talents soon put him on a collision course with the Beast -- the psychotic madman who has superhuman strength and 23 distinct personalities. Their epic showdown leads them to an encounter with the mysterious Elijah Price, the criminal mastermind who holds critical secrets for both men.

programme.title: The Quiet Ones
programme.desc: An unorthodox college professor leads his best students off the grid to perform a dangerous experiment to create a poltergeist. Operating under the theory that paranormal activity is triggered by negative human energy, the group uses a series of tests to push a young woman to the edge of sanity. Frightening occurrences with unspeakable consequences subsequently unfold, leading the researchers to the realization that they have unleashed a force more terrifying than they could have imagined.

programme.title: Leprechaun Returns
programme.desc: It's been 25 years since Tory Reding put an end to a psychotic Leprechaun trying to kill her and her friends for stealing his pot of gold - and no one has heard a wicked limerick since. But after she gifted the property to a local college in her will, a group of students unwittingly revive him while turning the old cabin into their green sorority house. Now, this renewable enemy is back for his gold, and ready to give these girls, and one old friend, a lesson in murder.

programme.title: Lake Placid: Legacy
programme.desc: A group of Urban Explorers venture to a mysterious lake and uncover secrets buried for twenty-five years. They quickly discover they are not alone and encounter a deadly threat that can kill them all.

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: Reporter Angela (Jennifer Carpenter) and her cameraman Scott (Steve Harris) are doing a story on night-shift firefighters for a reality-TV program. A late-night distress call takes them to a Los Angeles apartment building, where the police are investigating a report of horrific screams. The TV team and emergency workers find an old woman, who suddenly attacks with teeth bared. What's more, Angela and company find that the building has been sealed by CDC workers. Then the attacks really begin.

programme.title: Finding Your Feet
programme.desc: A middle-class snob on the eve of retirement takes refuge with her bohemian sister after she discovers her husband is having an affair with her best friend.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a retired widower in his 70s becomes senior intern at a fashion based e-commerce company. Jules Ostin, the founder, while first hesitant, soon learns to respect and even like her new intern despite their age difference.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydia's life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuice's name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film `Saturday Night', we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including `Wayne's World', `Bridesmaids' and more.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic father finds that there are not enough hours in the day to balance his job and home life, until he discovers a remote control that can pause and rewind time. However, when it malfunctions, chaos ensues, and the man realises that he has lost control of his life.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Jake reunites with his brother, Elwood -- collectively known as the `Blues Brothers'. Jake's first task is to save the orphanage the brothers grew up in from closing, by raising 5000 dollars to pay back taxes. The two are convinced they can earn the money by getting their old band back together. However, after playing several gigs and making a few enemies, including the police, the brothers face daunting odds to deliver the money on time.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncle's company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds' inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Two siblings dance their way through the Los Angeles club scene while trying to open up their own establishment.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydia's life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuice's name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2
programme.desc: Father and stepfather Dusty and Brad join forces to make Christmastime perfect for the children. Their newfound partnership soon gets put to the test when Dusty's old-school, macho dad and Brad's gentle father arrive to turn the holiday upside down. After a sudden change in plans, the four men decide to take the kids to a luxury resort for a fun-filled getaway that turns into a hilarious and chaotic adventure.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a plot by a dangerous criminal organisation endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesn't need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film `Saturday Night', we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including `Wayne's World', `Bridesmaids' and more.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that he is about to cause.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon can't let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: A girl who's sick of the social strictures of junior high is transformed into a grownup overnight. In this feel-good fairy tale, teenager Jenna wants a boyfriend, and when she's unable to find one, she fantasizes about being a well-adjusted adult. Suddenly, her secret desire becomes a reality, and she is transformed into a 30-year-old. However, adulthood, with its own set of male-female challenges, isn't as easy as it looks.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Foregone Conclusion.' However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now' style documentary.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss and can't remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that he's in it for love.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2
programme.desc: Father and stepfather Dusty and Brad join forces to make Christmastime perfect for the children. Their newfound partnership soon gets put to the test when Dusty's old-school, macho dad and Brad's gentle father arrive to turn the holiday upside down. After a sudden change in plans, the four men decide to take the kids to a luxury resort for a fun-filled getaway that turns into a hilarious and chaotic adventure.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donna's pregnant daughter reunites with her mother's old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie is given another makeover to become the face of the Bureau, prior to embarking on a promotional tour. When two of her friends are kidnapped - Miss USA and a beauty pageant director - she decides to investigate on her own, in defiance of orders to the contrary.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Legendary pet detective Ace Ventura returns for another adventure when he's coerced out of retirement while on a soul-searching retreat in the Himalayas. He must now retrieve an endangered white bat from a village located in Africa. The sacred animal was offered up as a wedding dowry from the Wachootoo prince to the Wachati princess, and, if Ace can't track down the culprit behind the kidnapping in time, civil war will break out between the two rival tribes.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters who have attacked New York.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film `Saturday Night', we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including `Wayne's World', `Bridesmaids' and more.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harry's long lost daughter, and Lloyd's in love again.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A champion NASCAR driver's cosy position alongside his best friend at the top of the championship is threatened by a flamboyant French newcomer. With his confidence shattered, the driver draws on the help of his father and some eccentric training techniques to claw his way back to the top.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friend's killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: Tensions run high as producer Lorne Michaels and a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers prepare for the first broadcast of "Saturday Night Live" on Oct. 11, 1975.

programme.title: The 40 Year-Old Virgin
programme.desc: Electronics store stock boy Andy Stitzer is horrified when he is found out as a virgin by his workmates - just when he thought he was becoming one of the gang. David, Jay and Cal surprise him by making it their mission to get him a girl and help him lose his virginity.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Disgraced FBI agents Marcus and Kevin go to bizarre lengths to catch a devious millionaire. They disguise themselves as dumb white socialites Brittany and Tiffany Wilson, the heiresses to a hotel fortune who are under threat. Gross-out comedic farce from the makers of `Scary Movie'.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Juliet & Romeo
programme.desc: The greatest love story of all time, set as an original pop musical. Based on the real story that inspired William Shakespeare's 'Romeo and Juliet'.

programme.title: Ick
programme.desc: Science teacher Hank's life changes when he reconnects with his first love and suspects a new student is his daughter, all while facing an alien threat in their town.

programme.desc: When his beloved wife, Kathryn, is suspected of betraying the nation, intelligence agent George Woodhouse faces the ultimate test -- loyalty to his marriage or his country.

programme.title: Lake George
programme.desc: Don is strong-armed by mobsters to execute a hit on Phyllis, but instead the two hatch a plan to steal money from the people who want her dead.

programme.title: Grow

programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the show's opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: When an ex-cop is told that four androids, known as replicants, who have mutinied in a bid to extend their limited lifespan have illegally fled back to Earth, he sets out on the trail to terminate them.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: A science professor and his cohorts battle a slew of rapidly growing alien organisms that threaten to overrun the Earth.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Dr Ryan Stone and Matt Kowalsky are stranded in space with no way to contact Earth after their shuttle is destroyed in the midst of a routine space walk.

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: When infertility threatens mankind with extinction and the last child born has perished, a disillusioned bureaucrat becomes the unlikely champion in the fight for the survival of Earth's population. He must face down his own demons and protect the planet's last remaining hope from danger.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: It's the year 2025 and an enormous corporation known as The Union has revolutionised the medical world by creating artificial human organs. The only problem is that those benefiting from transplants find themselves heavily in dept with the ruthless company and if the steep bills aren't paid so-called repo men are sent in to collect.

programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Horror Villians
programme.desc: Celebrate Halloween by facing horror at it's finest and terror in every form: from the haunted halls of `The Shining' to the unseen menace of `The Invisible Man'.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: A manic Johannesburg is policed by an army of android cops. The robots' inventor secretly works on a prototype officer which can feel and think for itself but it is stolen and forced into a life of crime when stolen by crooks.

programme.title: Omni Loop
programme.desc: A quantum physicist finds herself stuck in a time loop with a black hole growing in her chest and only a week to live. When she meets a gifted student they team up to save her life and unlock the mysteries of time travel.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Dr Ryan Stone and Matt Kowalsky are stranded in space with no way to contact Earth after their shuttle is destroyed in the midst of a routine space walk.

programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Set in the near future, the film chronicles the odyssey of 30 young men and women who are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is what's outside the ship or who they're becoming inside it.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: When infertility threatens mankind with extinction and the last child born has perished, a disillusioned bureaucrat becomes the unlikely champion in the fight for the survival of Earth's population. He must face down his own demons and protect the planet's last remaining hope from danger.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross is sent by her father-in-law, mogul RB Travis, to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly, Ross and a mismatched search party including scientist Dr Peter Elliot, treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka and a gorilla, discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Dr Ryan Stone and Matt Kowalsky are stranded in space with no way to contact Earth after their shuttle is destroyed in the midst of a routine space walk.

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: A group of misguided animal rights activists free a caged chimp infected with the 'Rage' virus from a medical research lab. When London bike courier Jim wakes up from a coma a month after, he finds his city all but deserted. On the run from the zombie-like victims of the Rage, Jim stumbles upon a group of survivors, including Selena and cab driver Frank, and joins them on a perilous journey to what he hopes will be safety.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A group of scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal them. Only one man survives. He has two aims: to find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Escape From the 21st Century
programme.desc: Three friends discover they have the power to travel back and forth twenty years with a sneeze. The future is not as good as they hoped, and they need to take on the responsibility of saving the world.

programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Set in the near future, the film chronicles the odyssey of 30 young men and women who are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is what's outside the ship or who they're becoming inside it.

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.
